apps.author: ImranR98
apps.name: Obtainium
apps.changeLog:
## What's Changed
* Added fastlane structure for F-Droid by @ClockGen in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1315
* Update zh.json by @ygxbnet in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1322
* Update vi.json by @teaminh in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1319
* Update ja.json by @bluefly000 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1316
* Update de.json by @DwainZwerg in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1323
* Update es.json by @palopezv in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1332
* De-emphasize 'reset install status' button to avoid confusion, Minor bugfix (#1331) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1334
* Don't include prereleases in default app entry by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1335

## New Contributors
* @ClockGen made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1315
* @teaminh made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1319
* @palopezv made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/1332

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v0.16.1-beta...v1.0.0

apps.author: beemdevelopment
apps.name: Aegis
apps.changeLog:
## New features

* An optional 'name' field for icon packs to bypass filename character restrictions

## Fixed bugs

* The Authenticator Pro importer only supported the legacy backup format
* A crash could occur in the tile service

apps.author: j-hc
apps.name: ReVanced Extended
apps.changeLog:
Music-Extended (arm64-v8a): 6.33.52  
YouTube-Extended: 18.45.43  
Music-Extended (arm-v7a): 6.33.52  

Install [Vanced Microg](https://github.com/TeamVanced/VancedMicroG/releases) for non-root YouTube and YT Music  
Use [zygisk-detach](https://github.com/j-hc/zygisk-detach) module to detach YouTube and YT Music from Play Store  

[revanced-magisk-module](https://github.com/j-hc/revanced-magisk-module)

apps.changeLog:
- 334 new icons, 9766 in total
- Fixed icons not applying properly
- Happy New Year!

apps.author: breezy-weather
apps.name: Breezy Weather
apps.changeLog:
**Weather sources**
- [AccuWeather] Fix snow quantity being 10 times lower
- [AccuWeather] Request texts in Imperial units if precipitation unit in app is configured as inch
- [MÃ©tÃ©o-France] Fix normals (missing in January, shifted by one month on other months)

**Other improvements and fixes**
- Fix incorrect degree day in Fahrenheit
- Show 2 decimals instead of 1 when precipitation unit is inch
- Fix air quality index being always shown as 250 when index > 250

**Translations**
- Initial translation added for Hindi (thanks Chandra Mohan Jha!)
- Translations updated

*Releases distributed on GitHub do not include proprietary Network Location Providers*

---
